diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Gastric ulcers, duodenal ulcer; Low magnesium (hypomagnesemia); Atrial tachycardia; Anemia; Alcohol use
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with gastrointestinal symptoms, diffuse fatigue, and a history of previous conditions including peptic ulcer disease, which warranted investigations leading to the diagnosis of pancreatitis. Additional supportive findings included abdominal discomfort, lightheadedness, and nausea.
